features: 🚀 Added BSE INDEX downloader support with proper column formatting
⚡ Implemented fast download strategy (5-10x faster downloads)
📅 Added GitHub market holidays integration (auto-skip holidays)
🎨 Enhanced GUI with dynamic options based on exchange selection
💾 Implemented memory-based file processing (no temp files)
🛑 Fixed application freeze on stop download
📊 Improved progress tracking with real-time updates
bug_fixes: Fixed application freeze when stopping downloads
Resolved BSE INDEX column ordering (IndexName first, then Date)
Fixed console log clearing after download completion
Improved GUI flickering during downloads with update throttling
Fixed NSE INDEX date pattern recognition
Corrected BSE INDEX start date (April 17, 2025 onwards)
Enhanced error handling for server timeouts
breaking_changes: Configuration file format updated for new exchanges
BSE INDEX file format changed to match NSE INDEX structure

update_message: 🎉 Major update available! BSE INDEX support, 5x faster downloads, and much more!
